fixes.name: NVega Up + Vega Up
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau calculated field [NVEGA_UP]+[VEGA_UP] to a DAX calculated column using row-level addition of the two columns.

fixes.name: Vega & NVega Up CAD
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau expression [NVega Up + Vega Up]*[TO_CAD] to a DAX calculated column multiplying the previously created calculated column by the TO_CAD column.
